data.eml:eml: Cirrhilabrus wakanda, a new species of fairy wrasse from mesophotic ecosystems of Zanzibar, Tanzania, Africa (Teleostei, Labridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tea, Yi-Kai, Pinheiro, Hudson T., Shepherd, Bart, Rocha, Luiz A. (2019): Cirrhilabrus wakanda, a new species of fairy wrasse from mesophotic ecosystems of Zanzibar, Tanzania, Africa (Teleostei, Labridae). ZooKeys 863: 85-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.863.35580, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.863.35580
